author: potuz
content: I never understood the EIP editorial process, nor I know how to look up the final version of them. So definitely this could be my bad, but why is this EIP marked final call, with a final call deadline of 2022, with a big box saying that it is actively reviewed and scheduled to be included in a fork in two days? https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1153

author: _shemnon
content: Now that ERCs are forked off we need to re-write the EIP stages with core development in mind.  This "final call" process makes sense for non-client things like smart contract patterns, not so much for hard forks.
